title: Kiss Away the Lies
description: We’re in this together—lie for lie, truth for truth. We’ve both been damaged by our pasts, both terrified of building a future…Still, there’s a sliver of hope for the both of us—if one of us is willing to fold first. He’s the king of lies, I’m the queen, and together we’re going to build one hell of a legacy...
author: Whitney G.
